description: Garlic confit is a popular recipe due to its rich, buttery texture and sweet, aromatic flavour. Slathered on toast or slipped under chicken skin before roasting, it's the perfect alternative to butter.
name: Garlic Confit Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 120Â°C. Add the garlic cloves to a deep baking dish, then scatter the herbs around the garlic evenly. Pour the oil into the baking dish making sure the garlic is submerged.

Place the baking dish in the oven and slow roast the garlic for two hours or until the garlic is soft and tender. Allow the garlic to cool before pouring the oil and the garlic into a large 1L sterilised jar. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks.
